org.springframework.integration.support.management

Interface MessageSourceManagement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DisposableBean, IntegrationManagement, MessageSourceMetrics
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFetchLimitingMessageSource, AbstractInboundFileSynchronizingMessageSource, AbstractRemoteFileStreamingMessageSource, FtpInboundFileSynchronizingMessageSource, FtpStreamingMessageSource, LifecycleMessageSourceManagement, LifecycleTrackableMessageSourceManagement, SftpInboundFileSynchronizingMessageSource, SftpStreamingMessageSource

    @IntegrationManagedResource
public interface MessageSourceManagement
extends MessageSourceMetrics
    Message sources implementing this interface have additional properties that can be set or examined using JMX.
    Since:
    5.0
    Author:
    Gary Russell

    • Method Detail

      • setMaxFetchSize

        @ManagedAttribute(description="Maximum objects to fetch")
void setMaxFetchSize(int maxFetchSize)
        Set the maximum number of objects the source should fetch if it is necessary to fetch objects. Setting the maxFetchSize to 0 disables remote fetching, a negative value indicates no limit.
        Parameters:
        maxFetchSize - the max fetch size; a negative value means unlimited.

      • getMaxFetchSize

        @ManagedAttribute
int getMaxFetchSize()
        Return the max fetch size.
        Returns:
        the max fetch size.
        See Also:
        setMaxFetchSize(int)
